Name: Remance of House Malabel
Description: Cavalry general of House Malabel. Joined military at age 17 and became general at age 26. He is an expert in heavy cavalry tactics and won various battles against enemies of the Mocnan Kingdom throughout his military career. As he grows older, he wishes that his name will be remembered alongside other greatest heroes.

Name: Amunsa
Description: It is often said that creation represents the personality of the creator. The weapons that Amunsa created were all in the hand of the greatest warriors and rulers in written history. The perfection of quality comes not only from pure talent but also thousand hours of hard-working practice. His arts were even praised by the dwarf craftsmen, something that no human ever have the grace to ever receive it.

Name: Jonas Elbadai
Description: The world is not only made of black and white. It existed in many shades of colour, maybe even the colours we can never see. So does a person and his or her characteristics. But must so-called characteristic be constant? What would happen if a person can change his personality in the matter of friction of a second? Not simply faking it but completely alters it at the very core to become a completely new identity. Can such a thing even be called person anymore or it becomes something incomprehensible entirely?

Name: Vars Karsunlaamt
Description: Peerless warrior who always seek a new challenge. His growth and lust in fighting know no bounds. His single-mindedness is very troublesome for many people involved in his life. Now a king of Masendor, the hero of Meskemdar, the first of house Karsunlaamt. His rule will certainly bring change to the history of the whole world.

Name: Orsanoas
Description: A mighty warrior in the companion of mighty fellows. Orsanoas is brutish as much as honest, quick to anger and even quicker to decide. He does not take kindly to deception and will swiftly cut down anyone whom he thinks has wronged him. Despite being a warrior, Orsanoas does not flavour wearing any armour of sort. His favourite weapon seems to be a giant swordstaff named "Aetel".

Name: Gaf Ra Naf Ma Ko Nunoada
Rodhinbar Leafleft Rora
Description: Militia trainer and leader of Leafleft village. Proficient in bow and close combat. Rodhinbar hardly ever left his village due to being far from the country's border and warzone. Such peace means that he had not fully utilised his skill and seen the horror of war.

Name: Saqir the Pitiful
Description: There is no other king in history more pitiful than Saqir the Pitiful. Despite his talent and ingenious rulership, he just simply cannot overcome his extraordinarily bad luck. His country will fall to ruin no matter what he accomplishes as he can only delay the inevitable and he himself aware of such fact. Can the course of history be changed by unseen external being or the card of fate cannot be turned over.

Name: Old Man Hona the Sacred Flame
Adaqua
Description: De Facto leader of Saennrae (Goods Muggers) bandit gang operating near the border forest of the Ralsarn Kingdom, born of an unknown father and mother. Adaqua has a natural talent with the way of mobile archery, a gift that unfortunately has never been recognised. Her bandit gang is well-known for ambush tactics against patrols and merchant caravans with a perfect success record. However, soon the future will come when mere survival with a life of banditry will no longer be enough. Will a close-knitted group of savages be able to settle into a sustainable community? Or will they roam the earth until their descendants are wiped out by the ever-growing civilise military forces?

Name: Vraesier
Description: There is a tale of an abomination entity that resides in the Forest of Skangra. This mysterious creature has one eye and wears the skin of a female clad in tattered armour and swing its monstrously huge great sword at whoever crosses its path. Rumour is that this creature once was seen talking to another similar female creature or even travelling together. Nobody knows where they came from or why they stalked the forest, but the first sighting was around 20 years ago by the hunter whose arm got chopped off.

Name: Niavesia the Royal Knight
Description: Captain of the elite royal guard unit, Milingrels. The Protector of Tower Throne. She is born into a soldier family and discovers talent in fighting at a young age. After proving herself in the Trial of Giasarost at age 20, she becomes the personal bodyguard to the royal family of Werlermar House.

Name: Aunnial the Holy Maiden
Description: Out of 10 Holy Maidens that show the most aptitude to "Holy" magic in Valle, Aunnial is the only one that passed the Night of Suffering Ritual at age 9, which make her the fourth Holy Maiden in history that passed it. Her ability to channel the magic is far above even some of the most powerful wizards. Although lacking in combat and leadership proficiency, her role as the Holy Maiden and the belief that she will protect the country from all evils make her authority reaching to the point of worshipping.

Name: Liwa of House Tarlsov
Description: The Empire of Flowers is at risk of invasion from all side, with the fall of Masendor and the rise of the commoner king is the foretold of the end of an era. To safeguard her empire, empress Liwa Tarlsorv strengthens her resolve to unite humanity together against the threat of corruption despite her husband more liberal rulership. Only when united against the common threat can the human race survive in this harsh and unforgiving world.

Name: Mounniley Leitanonde
Description: I am Mounniley Leitanonde and I am called a hero by some, even a villain by some others. This is not the story of my journey but rather the story of this world. I am a mere character in it and I will act accordingly. My hero companions will accompany me through this road of a godless dream until this world is no more.
